      • storeConversation

        public static void storeConversation​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                     int id,
                                     int userid,
                                     java.lang.String prompt,
                                     java.lang.String response,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp timestamp)
        Inserts a conversation into the specified database with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        connection - the database connection to be used for the insertion
        id - the id of the conversation
        userid - the id of the user who initiated the conversation
        prompt - the prompt text of the conversation
        response - the response text of the conversation
        timestamp - the timestamp of the conversation

      • retrieveConversations

        public static void retrieveConversations​(java.sql.Connection connection)
        Retrieves all conversations stored in the database and prints them to the console.
        Parameters:
        connection - the Connection object representing the database connection

      • retrieveConversationsPerUser

        public static void retrieveConversationsPerUser​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                                int userid)
        Retrieves all conversations for a given user ID from the "CONVERSATIONS" table in the specified database connection. Prints each conversation in the format "id ++ userid ++ prompt ++ response ++ time_stamp" to the console.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to the database
        userid - the ID of the user whose conversations will be retrieved
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if a database access error occurs

        public static void InsertTable​(java.sql.Connection connection,
                               java.lang.String query)
        Inserts data into a table in a database using a SQL query.
        Parameters:
        connection - A Connection object representing a database connection.
        query - A String containing the SQL query to execute.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs while executing the query or closing the statement.
